features.title: Uses postcss and sass with autoprefixer
Uses data from local json files
Contains Node.js server code for easy, secure, and fast hosting
SVG sprites: Add your icons in `components/icon` as .icon files and use them.

howTo.title: Run: `npm i` to install the dependencies

menu.title: Grilled Shrimp
menu.description: Explanation text in the form of a paragraph. Maybe between 2-3 sentences. Enough at least to demo some info and have some dummy data. Delicious ingredients to whet the taste buds.
